name: ametrine.host
description: Hosting service providing various virtual hosting solutions at an affordable price.

scripts.build: cp -r src/* dist&&echo '[ametrine] building'&&npx tsc -p .&&echo '[ametrine] cleaning'&&find dist -name '*.ts' -type f -delete
scripts.sql: echo '[ametrine] merging sql files'&&sqlite3 data/db/database.db < dist/sql/init.sql
scripts.mb: echo '[ametrine] moving billing from dist to src'&&rm -rf src/modules/views/billing&&mkdir src/modules/views/billing&&cp -r dist/modules/views/billing/* src/modules/views/billing
scripts.move-main-website: echo '[ametrine] moving main-website from dist to src'&&rm -rf src/modules/views/css &&mkdir src/modules/views/css &&cp -r dist/modules/views/css/* src/modules/views/css &&rm -rf src/modules/views/html &&mkdir src/modules/views/html &&cp -r dist/modules/views/html/* src/modules/views/html &&rm -rf src/modules/views/js &&mkdir src/modules/views/js &&cp -r dist/modules/views/js/* src/modules/views/js &&rm -rf src/modules/views/templates &&mkdir src/modules/views/templates &&cp -r dist/modules/views/templates/* src/modules/views/templates
scripts.ls: npm run build && npm run nstart

author: Ametrine
